name: Naples 14x32 Wrap Around Deck Plan
open_features: (12) 18×18×12 in reinforced concrete footings with 6×6 posts
Railing: 4×4 posts with 2×4 rails, 2×2 balusters @6 in O.C. (≤4 in spacing)
Hardware: Simpson ABU66Z bases, LUS28 hangers, LPC4Z caps, HUC412 hangers, A34 clips, LSC connectors
Wrap-around layout provides access on multiple sides and lounge-ready perimeter
safety_note: Plans are preliminary; final engineering, code compliance, and permitting must be addressed by licensed professionals.
